products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in denim is so much more than a fabric that allows you to get the perfect restful sleep mind and body need. It's a contemporary shade whose texture really brings the colour to life, and allows you to do something a little bit special. We love the idea of hanging denim in the kitchen so that you can turn on the style when it's time to cook up a feast. If you have the option to match it to the tiling then even better, but don't feel like you have to constrain yourself when the time comes to make a change.

products.description: A stunning jewelled blue shade. Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy. products.title: Spectrum, Space Blue - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum range's space blue is a classic, bold blue, on a delightfully smooth, satin-finish aluminium. Fully adjustable slats sit neatly, and can be easily manoeuvred to control the amount of light that is let into the room. Enhance a cool blue child's room by placing the space blue against pale blue walls or patterned wallpaper, pairing with white furniture, and accenting with playful primary colours.

products.title: Spectrum, Picton Blue - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love blue in all its shades, but are looking for that perfect sky blue, look no further, because we've found it. The spectrum in picton blue is sweet blue that feels as if it's been grabbed directly from the sky, and matching rails and pull-cords streamline the look. The pretty, outdoorsy feel of the picton blue makes this the perfect choice for a light and airy kitchen, where you can recreate a sky-like feel by adding in whites and paler blues.

products.title: Spectrum, Pickled Bluewood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The darkest of blues is blended with a muted, understated elegance, resulting in the pickled bluewood from the spectrum collection. This smooth, satin-finish aluminium blind has horizontal slats that are easily manoeuvrable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Keep light disturbances out in the den or home office with the cool pickled bluewood hanging pleasantly in the window, coupled with light greys and chevron patterning.

products.title: Spectrum, Science Blue - Venetian Blind
products.description: The science blue blind, from the spectrum range, is vividness at its finest. The bright blue aluminium slats exude modern, contemporary style, whilst offering easy workability with the simple pull-cords to tilt and control the blind, to allow light in or to keep it out. For a cool, industrial vibe in your office, sit the science blue amongst the palest of greys, with white furniture, accompanied by charcoal grey and pale blue accents, resulting in a funky, colour-coordinated look that you won't want to leave.

products.title: Spectrum, Blue Chill - Venetian Blind
products.description: Combine a deep, vivid turquoise with high quality aluminium slats, and you're left with the spectrum blue chill, a stunningly vibrant blind with plenty to offer in terms of style, colour, and workability. Sit the gorgeous blue chill amongst soft sands and barely-there aquas to create a seaside vibe that is simply irresistible, an ideal colour scheme for the bathroom or en-suite. Or use in a child's bedroom with the softest of pinks, which will serve to make this blind truly pop.

products.title: Spectrum, Rock Blue - Venetian Blind
products.description: Rock blue is a soft aqua offering from the spectrum range and, reminiscent of the ocean, this blind is a show-stealer. Don't mistake it for all style and no substance though, because the aluminium slats are high quality and fully adjustable, making this a practical window covering as well as an attractive one. Give the rock blue a serene white backdrop in the bathroom, to offset it beautifully, or surround with sand colours in the dining room to truly recreate the beach.

products.title: Electra Blue
products.description: Electra blue metallic metal venetian blind.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The sweet duck egg of roma's aqua haze makes for a lovely accent to any window. The colour really comes into its own when set against the outside sunlight, and it provides privacy without blocking the light out altogether. For some country chic, pair with pretty floral curtains in your dining room or place against white walls and pine units in a kitchen to truly brighten things up. The pale colour also makes this the ideal blind for small utility rooms or bathrooms that don't get a lot of natural light.

products.title: Fortune, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in fortune green is a subtle, blue-teal shade with a wonderfully oceanic look to it. Typical of roma fabric, the material is supple yet strong, making for a high quality blind that lasts. Opt for a lovely seaside theme in your bedroom by matching the fortune green to shabby chic accessories, bleached woods, and similar blues and greens. Go one step further and add seashells and coastal pictures too.

products.description: Dark as the night but with a sleek, glossy finish, the essence imperial blue blind is colourful yet classy, perfect for the contemporary home. products.title: Wow Factor, Brushed Azure - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in brushed azure is a muted silver with just the faintest hint of blue and it will rest discreetly against your window frame. Control the light in the room easily by using the pull-cords to adjust the position of the aluminium slats, moving and tilting them at will. The brushed azure will provide any window with a hushed metallic look so that bolder features in the room can take centre stage.

products.title: Verona Blackout Navy Roller Blind
products.description: Grace your favourite space with a little nautical chic, with this stunning blue roller blind. A blackout roller blind is perfect for almost any space, its protective backing providing a shield against the sun on even the brightest days, and keeping you private at all times.
